def transform(sequence):
    return sequence[:6] + str(int(sequence[6]) + 2) + sequence[7:] if sequence[6] != '8' else sequence[:6] + '8' + sequence[7:] if sequence[7] == '6' else sequence[:7] + '6' + sequence[8:] if sequence[8] != '8' else sequence[:8] + str(int(sequence[8]) - 2) + sequence[9:]
